column4: Details
Oh, hello! Guess who we have here!
column10: PopupMessage: hiển thị popup text PopupMessageImage ActionClick: req người chơi hành động Input:req người chơi input
column11: Biểu cảm xin chào, thân thiện. tay phải xin chào (I)

column4: Who am I? I'm Lumi, the one who watches over this land
At the request of your grandmother, I will now hand over this land to you; it is her most treasured possession
You've never tried farming before, have you? Now, I'll help you with a few basic steps
Now, let's go to the shop and buy some seeds to try
column11: Biểu cảm hơi mệt, 2 tay bê cái giỏ hàng mua hạt giống, hơi nặng trĩu 1 xíu (tham khảo hạt giống của chị Đài) (II)

column4: Click shop button
This is the seed shop. You can see its description information
Each type of seed will have a different growth time, and plants will go through a total of 5 growth stages
Try clicking to buy one seed
Click buy
column11: Biểu cảm vui vẻ, đang mở balo. (III)

column4: Congratulations! You've successfully purchased it. Now, please check your inventory
Click close
Click inventory
Here's the seed you just purchased. Now, let's start planting it!
column11: Biểu cảm hơi mệt 1 xíu, đang cầm cuốc  trồng cây. (IV)

column4: Click Close
Click Empty tile
Click Carrot
That's it! Now you can click on the plant to check when it will grow
It will show the time it will take for the plant to grow to the next stage.
Because the plant may need watering, if you don't water it, the plant will stop growing
column11: Biểu cảm vẻ vẻ đang tưới nước (Tham khảo bình tưới chị đài)

column4: Sometimes, the plant may also get infected
column11: Biểu cảm vẻ vẻ đang cầm bình thuốc trừ sâu (Tham khải bình thuốc trừ sâu c đài)

column4: Or weeds
column11: Biểu cảm vẻ vẻ đang cầm bình thuốc diệt cỏ (Tham khải bình diệt cỏ sâu c đài)

column4: The plant will continue to grow, but if not treated in time, it will affect the yield
column11: Biểu cảm vui vẻ, trung lập

column4: That's it! Now, please continue with your farming. I have a little errand to run, bye bye ~ <3
column11: Biểu cảm vui vẻ, chào tạm biệt
